name: DiversiFi
description: DiversiFi is a deflationary digital asset designed to increase in value through strategic tokenomics. Built on Ethereum , DiversiFi captures profits from AI and copy trading strategies in traditional stock option markets. These profits are recycled into token buybacks and burns , steadily lowering supply and establishing an ever-rising price floor . Our mission is simple: make day trading profitable and accessible for all, while reducing the risks of constant monitoring, missed alerts, or unreliable signals.
